message: Starting work: examining existing week1.json structure and source materials for weeks 3-4
Source materials analyzed. Creating enhanced week3.json (Learning) with comprehensive content and 15+ enhanced questions covering classical conditioning, operant conditioning, and cognitive learning
Week3.json complete with 17 enhanced questions (5 learning, 6 application, 6 tricky). Now creating week4.json for Motivation content.

COMPLETED: Created week3.json (Learning - 17 enhanced questions: 7 learning, 6 application, 4 tricky) and week4.json (Motivation - 18 enhanced questions: 6 learning, 8 application, 4 tricky). Both files validated successfully. All questions include enhanced format with difficulty levels, detailed correct explanations, and specific incorrect option explanations. Content covers: Week 3 - Classical conditioning (Pavlov, Watson, Little Albert/Peter), Operant conditioning (Thorndike, Skinner, reinforcement schedules), Cognitive approaches (Tolman's latent learning, Köhler's insight), Biological preparedness, Learned helplessness. Week 4 - Drive theory (homeostasis), Instinct theory, Arousal theory (optimal stimulation), Expectancy-value theory, Intrinsic vs Extrinsic motivation (overjustification effect), Achievement motivation (McClelland, TAT measurement). Files written directly to study-site/src/data/weeks/ as specified.
